description: Meritous and Klondike solitaire are the two games I return to time and again. Not much color, navigation old school, rudimentary monsters. Gameplay sort of like mostly in one's imagination a la Rogue. Recommended.

Although the premise of the game is the same, the dungeon is random generated which makes every game a new adventure.

Sadly all stats cannot be maxed given the number of crystals so one has to choose whether to balance the character or favor a certain stat.

Also rewards from rooms appear to be randomly generated every time a save state is loaded. For example: if you save a game and then loot a chest and get one power-up which you may not like it; if you reload the save and loot the chest again, chances are you will find a different power-up.
Well made, but I am not motivated by games with no end in sight and bland colors...
